rata wenuwen kapa wana bawata gotagen prakashayak rata wenuwen haki uparimayen sewaya kota athi mama, idiriyedith rata wenuwen oba apeksha karana oonama mehewarakata sudanam bawath, eyata erehi wana kisidu badhakayakata yatapath nowana bawath, deshapremi samastha shri lankiya janathawata itha aadarayen saha wagakimen prakasha karana bawa meratata pamini pasu gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha siya fesbuk ginume thaba athi nawathama satahanathabamin pawasayi.
